member.name: T:ShaderEffectLibrary.ToonShaderEffect
member.summary: This is the implementation of an extensible framework ShaderEffect which loads a shader model 2 pixel shader. Dependecy properties declared in this class are mapped to registers as defined in the *.ps file being loaded below.

member.name: F:ShaderEffectLibrary.ToonShaderEffect.InputProperty
member.summary: Dependency property for the shader sampler.

member.name: F:ShaderEffectLibrary.ToonShaderEffect.pixelShader
member.summary: The pixel shader instance.

member.name: M:ShaderEffectLibrary.ToonShaderEffect.#cctor
member.summary: Creates a PixelShader by loading the bytecode.

member.name: M:ShaderEffectLibrary.ToonShaderEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Creates the and updates the registered values defined within the pixel shader using the default values.

member.name: P:ShaderEffectLibrary.ToonShaderEffect.Input
member.summary: Gets or sets the Input variable within the shader.

member.summary: For this operation, the bounds is the bounding box of the 4 transformed points. Need to transform each of them, and then circumscribe. This is true for both the forward and the inverse.

member.param: The output point after transformed using the Swirl effect.

member.summary: Gets a clone of the inverse of the current transform.

member.name: F:ShaderEffectLibrary.BrightExtractEffect.InputProperty
member.summary: The explict input for this pixel shader.

member.name: F:ShaderEffectLibrary.BrightExtractEffect.ThresholdProperty
member.summary: This property is mapped to the Threshold variable within the pixel shader.

member.name: F:ShaderEffectLibrary.BrightExtractEffect.pixelShader
member.summary: A refernce to the pixel shader used.

member.name: M:ShaderEffectLibrary.BrightExtractEffect.#cctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of the shader from the included pixel shader.

member.name: M:ShaderEffectLibrary.BrightExtractEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance and updates the shader's variables to the default values.

member.name: P:ShaderEffectLibrary.BrightExtractEffect.Input
member.summary: Gets or sets the Input shader sampler.

member.name: P:ShaderEffectLibrary.BrightExtractEffect.Threshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the Threshold variable within the shader.

member.summary: If the transform is an inverse.

member.summary: The transform specific to this Effect.

member.summary: Creates a new instance.

member.summary: This particular effect keeps axis aligned lines axis aligned, so transformation of the rect is just transformation of its corner points.

member.summary: Attempt to transform a point based on the effect.

member.summary: Determines if a point is within an ellipse.
